title: Please add an extra mute button for pings.
body:
One button for chat, one button for pings.  I had to turn off my ping volume because so many people enjoy spamming the "?" whenever someone dies.  It's really frustrating and muting doesn't stop it.  

Please mute ping button roit thx.

replies.body: You can mute it in settings, you can still see it tho.

> [{quoted}](name=Kodak Yellow,realm=NA,application-id=3ErqAdtq,discussion-id=cbYxIXwG,comment-id=0000,timestamp=2016-11-10T05:25:15.182+0000)
>
> You can mute it in settings, you can still see it tho.

That mutes it for everyone, and it only mutes the volume.  I want to selectively mute out the raging 12 year old, not my entire team.
